hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec:
#start build at midnight: # @midnight #or start build at midnight, every Saturday: # 59 23 * * 6 #every 15th of every month between 2:00 a.m. - 02:30 a.m. : H(0-30) 1 15 * *
#or start build at midnight, every Saturday: #H 23 * * 6
